mapper.select: select * from t_devicestaterecord where DEVICE_NO = #{deviceNo} and GATEWAY_NO=#{gatewayNo}
mapper.insert: insert into t_devicestaterecord (RECORD_ID, DEVICE_NO, GATEWAY_NO,DEVICE_STATE_CMD, LAST_UPDATE_TIME, LAST_UPDATE_BY) values (#{recordId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deviceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gatewayNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deviceStateCmd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER})

DEVICE_NO = #{deviceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GATEWAY_NO = #{gatewayNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEVICE_STATE_CMD = #{deviceStateCmd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

LAST_UPDATE_BY = #{lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where RECORD_ID = #{recordId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
